00004 class IndividualPanel(wx.Panel):

00006     def __init__(self, parent, id, widget_style, grid, ui_data, size = None):
00007         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent, size = (300,300), style = wx.SIMPLE_BORDER)
00008 
00009         self.parent = parent
00010         self.id = id
00011 
00012         gridSize = [8,2]
00013         
00014         widgets = {}
00015         widgets['label'] = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText
00016         widgets['slider'] = wx.Slider
00017         widgets['button'] = wx.Button
00018         widgets['textbox'] = wx.TextCtrl
00019         widgets['combobox'] = wx.Choice
00020         self.widgets = widgets
00021 
00022         #self.SetBackgroundColour(tuple(widget_style[0]))
00023         self.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[0])
00024 
00025         sizer = wx.GridSizer(gridSize[0], gridSize[1], 2, 2)
00026 
00027         wIndex = 1
00028         layout = []
00029         for j in xrange(gridSize[0]):
00030             for k in xrange(gridSize[1]):
00031                 if grid[j*gridSize[1] + k] > 0:
00032                     _widget = self.addWidget(ui_data[grid[j*gridSize[1]+k]])
00033                     # set bg color
00034                     _widget.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[wIndex])
00035                     wIndex += 1
00036                     #layout.append(_widget)
00037                     sizer.Add(_widget, 1, border = 5, flag=wx.EXPAND)
00038 
00039                 else:
00040                     sizer.Add((20,5))
00041 
00042 
00043         sizer.Layout()
00044 
00045         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00046         self.bestLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Best:")
00047         self.worstLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Worst:")
00048 
00049         self.bestLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00050         self.worstLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00051         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00052         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00053 
00054         self.sizer.Add(self.bestLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00055         self.sizer.Add(self.worstLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00056         self.sizer.Add(sizer)
00057 
00058         self.Layout()
00059 
00060 
00061         #self.sizer.Fit(self);
00062         #self.sizer.SetSizeHints(self)
00063         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00064 
00065 
00066         self.Bind(wx.EVT_LEFT_DOWN, self.bestSelect, self)
00067         self.Bind(wx.EVT_RIGHT_DOWN, self.worstSelect, self)

00074     def getID(self):
00075         return self.id
00076 
00077 #------------------------------------------#
00078     def unSelect(self):
00079         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00080         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00081 
00082 #------------------------------------------#
00083     def bestSelect(self, event):
00084         self.bestLabel.Show()
00085         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00086         self.Layout()
00087         self.parent.onBestSelect(self.id)
00088 
00089 #------------------------------------------#
00090     def worstSelect(self, event):
00091         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00092         self.worstLabel.Show()
00093         self.Layout()
00094         self.parent.onWorstSelect(self.id)
00095

00097 #------------------------------------------#
00098     def addWidget(self, widget):
00099         _widget = None
00100         key = 'type'
00101         if widget[key] == 'label':
00102             _widget = self.widgets['label'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00103 
00104         elif widget[key] == 'textbox':
00105             _widget = self.widgets['textbox'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00106 
00107         elif widget[key] == 'button':
00108             _widget = self.widgets['button'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00109 
00110         elif widget[key] == 'slider':
00111             _widget = self.widgets['slider'](self, -1, size = eval(widget['size']))
00112 
00113         elif widget[key] == 'combobox':
00114             _widget = self.widgets['combobox'](self, -1, size = eval(widget['size']), choices = eval(widget['value']))
00115 
00116         return _widget
00117
